locations: au, australia, western australia, subiaco, 6008, hood street, 1, -31.9438496, 115.8228937
short_description: ora banda mining is a minerals, earths & ores supplier based in subiaco, australia.
long_description: mr mansell practised corporate and resources law for a number of years in south africa and australia. mr creagh is a mining engineer with over 20 years' experience working for both contracting and mining companies at projects throughout australia and overseas. mr rule has more than 25 years' experience as the cfo of asx listed mining companies with operations and projects in australia, africa, north and south america across several commodities. mr rule has considerable experience in international debt and equity financing of mining projects, implementation of accounting controls and systems, risk management, governance, and regulatory requirements in mining companies. ms cutler is a professional geologist with over 18 years extensive mineral exploration and resource development experience in the australian resources industry. ms dudley is an accomplished and safety-focused mining engineer with over 25 years of experience in the global mining industry. her expertise includes merger and acquisition analysis, technical studies, major project experience and assurance, and managing annual reporting of mineral resources and ore reserves.
generated_description: ora banda mining (asx: obm) is a gold exploration and development company based in the shire of menzies, western australia. the company is the 100% owner of the davyhurst gold project, located 120 km northwest of kalgoorlie. the project features a total mineral resource inventory of 2.00 moz at an average grade of 2.5 g/t au and defined mineral reserves of 276koz at 1.9 g/t au. ora banda mining also holds tenements that are prospective for nickel, copper, and lithium. the company operates a centralized 1.2 mtpa processing hub and has established infrastructure at davyhurst. ora banda mining is focused on unlocking significant value from its strategic and prospective landholdings, with targeted resource development activities at several advanced project areas. the company is governed by a board of directors with extensive experience in the resource and finance sectors.
generated_business_tags: gold exploration and development services | strategic landholdings | mining operations | gold manufacturing hub | mineral resource estimation | feasibility studies
